author: Staff Reporter
text:
Six autorickshaw drivers at the NGO Colony bus stop in Adambakkam have been arrested for assaulting another group of drivers.

The clash followed an auto-racing event between drivers of two different areas a couple of days ago. The drivers exchanged blows resulting in a serious head injury to one of them. Auto-racing is banned.

Those arrested are Deepak, Kalaiarasan and Rajkumar of Velachery and Manikandan, Kesavan and Dhanasekaran of Maduvinkarai, Guindy. They took part in a race on Maduravoyal Bypass road, in which the Velachery group won.

One of the participants threatened members of the losing group which triggered the clash.

They were arrested on Saturday and remanded to custody, he said.
title: Auto drivers arrested
